channel.title: A few questions i would like to ask.(tabs, commands, front screen)
channel.description:
first, i would like to ask where do i make more tabs or delete some where the emotes are normally??
second, how do you get rid of that front screen on some sources when u login.?
third, i would like someone to reply to this or pm me about which i need to put:
[code]if (command.startsWith("pickup")[/code]
[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {[/code]
[code]|| playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name"))) {[/code]
i would like someone to explain to me what these mean, and which i need to put to make a command.

item.title: A few questions i would like to ask.(tabs, commands, front screen)
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

no you cant delete the whole case you can change what it does and what it says with texthandler.java i think

item.title: A few questions i would like to ask.(tabs, commands, front screen)
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

so, if i wanted to delete the “home” tab, i would delete the whole of case 168 then compile?

if i wanted to make one would i need to make a command then add the command name into the command space?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2009, 04:09:09 pm[/size][hr]thank you chassy.

and i meant:

if (command.startsWith("eat") - their are commands that start with this.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") - this.

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name") - and this.

i meant that all commands start with one of these and i was wondering which one i would need to do to make the command i want to make.

anyone tell me, thanks.

kickingjamie, the first part helped me but if i was going to delete the case, would i need to delete all of it and compile??

the second part - i didnt actually mean what you put but thanks…
i already had the commands but i was just wondering what the first part ments and which i need to put to start my command ^above.

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions i would like to ask.(tabs, commands, front screen)

item.title: A few questions i would like to ask.(tabs, commands, front screen)
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Second: Under your initialize method, you will have something that loads a method. Something like

newWelc();

Delete the method or change it, or just delete the calling of the method from your initialize method.

I am not sure what you mean by number 3, but if you want to know what this means:

|| playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name")

then the ‘||’ is a logical operator. || means OR, so if you have something like this:

if(command.equals("master") && playerRights == 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("namehere")) {

That would mean that any players with the rights of 3 could do the master command, or if someone had the name ‘namehere’ then they could also do it.

Here is a great page to learn about Relational and Logical Operators, and much much more helpful information:

http://www.geocities.com/learnprogramming123/Clesson8.htm

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions i would like to ask.(tabs, commands, front screen)

item.title: A few questions i would like to ask.(tabs, commands, front screen)
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

i can help with the tabs it really simple heres how to change what they do…::

when you right click the emote tabs there are numbers these are cases… then find the one you want to change and search this in client.java case 168:
you should see somthing like this

case 168: if (teleblock == true) { // Made by Mod Allstar sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { customCommand("WHERE THE COMMAND TAKES YOU"); // made by Mod Allstar } break;

now change this part to the command you want it to do (“your command here”); if you wanted to change the one next to this then you would find the case id of it and instead of searching for case 168: you would search for case (case number):[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2009, 11:42:38 am[/size][hr]the commands are also easy to use heres how…im going to help you with the pickup up command…

[code] }

    if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
        try {
            int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
            int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("You suck at spawning. Do it again ! ");[/code]

that would complete your pickup command to make a teleporting command it would look somthing like this ::

} } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command name")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else { teleportToX = change these to x coords of tele; teleportToY = change these to y coords of tele; sendMessage("message send after you do the command.");

also you can make commands give you items like so::

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command name")) { addItem(item id, amount); sendMessage("message sent");

i hope i helped you

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2009, 11:52:31 am[/size][hr]did it work?

Read full topic
